A customizable Python library for automating file operations, system monitoring, and routine tasks

## Usage

```console
$ pychoreographer --help
```

## Features

```{include} ../README.md
---
start-after: <!-- features-begin -->

```

## FAQ

### What is this project about?

PyChoreographer is a customizable Python library designed to streamline routine tasks, including file operations, system monitoring, and automation. It aims to simplify common development processes and help you focus on your project's core functionality.


The project template is centered around the following tools:

- [Pypi][1] for packaging and dependency management
- [Nox][2] for automation of checks and other development tasks
- [GitHub Actions][3] for continuous integration and delivery

[1]: https://pypi.org/
[2]: https://nox.thea.codes/
[3]: https://github.com/features/actions

[Template][4]

[4]: https://cookiecutter-hypermodern-python.readthedocs.io/en/2022.6.3.post1/index.html
